main event: Eight moving lights were sighted in the atmosphere over Camp Hood, Texas, on the evening of 17 March 1949.
interesting points: The lights were reported as resembling very pistol flares., The guard of the 2nd Armored Division was prepared to fire at the lights., The sightings were recorded with specific coordinates and times., Physical characteristics of the lights were noted to be quite different from previous reports on March 6-8., Observers included personnel from the 2nd Armored Division and were reportedly credible.
sighted object: Eight unusual lights in the sky
witness description: Personnel of the 2nd Armored Division, under the Assistant AC of S, G-2.
